name: Total Destruction
description:
Want to destroy a 2d world? I have what partially fits your need with Total Destruction, though all the wood/bricks are the most molecularly stable piece of any destruction game.

PIECES

Planks - longest of any basic piece

Bricks - 'bout half of plank

-cube - it's the filler of the three pieces

enemies - they're cardboard cutouts but are key to winning a level

Payloads - left click to fire and launch existing payloads to your cursor, right-click however just launch existing payloads to your cursor.

Ground - not a piece, but is mentioned for the sake of you

Anchors - Mimics planks, but stays in air until it comes in contact with a Payload.
